pr_title: Reducing time in DR integration tests

timeline.body:
Are you sure that 10 events is sufficient for an integration test? I would feel more comfortable knowing that we test a "larger" number of events.

Is this really a driving factor for the time it takes to do this test? Pravega should have no issue, even in a unit/integration test, to handle 300 events.
